comment.author: 31515022@N00
comment._content: The ship in the picture is the "Nya Södertelje", built 1868 and refurbished in 1879. If you look at the picture at the bottom of this page: www.tugboatlars.se/Sodertaljeanga.htm you can see that it is taken almost at the same place, but probably at a later date since it is slightly altered. And according tho the text it is on the Södertälje Canal, and that is nowhere close to where you put it on the map. Also the picture could not be taken before 1879 as it then was named "Hållsviken", and from 1871 "Hållsviken I" (It was given the name "Nya Södertelje" after the refurbishment). In 1930 it was renamed to "Ilända Express", and in 1932 it was demolished.
